thread.title: BRIEF-SandRidge Energy Says On April 13, Icahn, Affiliates Notified Co That It Intends To Nominate 5 Individuals To Sandridge Board - SEC Filing

title: BRIEF-SandRidge Energy Says On April 13, Icahn, Affiliates Notified Co That It Intends To Nominate 5 Individuals To Sandridge Board - SEC Filing

organizations.name: sandridge board - sec filing reuters staff

text:
Funds News April 16, 2018 / 1:36 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-SandRidge Energy Says On April 13, Icahn, Affiliates Notified Co That It Intends To Nominate 5 Individuals To Sandridge Board - SEC Filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - SandRidge Energy Inc: 
* CARL C ICAHN - ON APRIL 13, ICAHN, AFFILIATES NOTIFIED SANDRIDGE ENERGY THAT IT INTENDS TO NOMINATE 5 INDIVIDUALS TO SANDRIDGE BOARD - SEC FILING 
* CARL C ICAHN SAYS 5 NOMINEES TO SANDRIDGE BOARD ARE JONATHAN FRATES, NICHOLAS GRAZIANO, JOHN LIPINSKI, BOB ALEXANDER AND RANDOLPH READ Source text: ( bit.ly/2H3FAV4 ) Further company coverage:
